mapper.insert: insert into role( roleId, account, name, money, gameId, sex, volume, musicVolume, loginTimeStr, offlineTimeStr, createTimeStr, loadTimeStr, moneyExchangeNum, moneyExchangeTimeStr ) values( #{roleId}, #{account}, #{name}, #{money}, #{gameId}, #{sex}, #{volume}, #{musicVolume}, #{loginTimeStr}, #{offlineTimeStr}, #{createTimeStr}, #{loadTimeStr}, #{moneyExchangeNum}, #{moneyExchangeTimeStr} )
mapper.update: update role set account=#{account}, name=#{name}, money=#{money}, gameId=#{gameId}, sex=#{sex}, loginTimeStr=#{loginTimeStr}, offlineTimeStr=#{offlineTimeStr}, createTimeStr=#{createTimeStr}, loadTimeStr=#{loadTimeStr} where roleId=#{roleId}
update role set moneyExchangeNum=#{moneyExchangeNum}, moneyExchangeTimeStr=#{moneyExchangeTimeStr} where roleId=#{roleId}
update role set volume=#{volume}, musicVolume=#{musicVolume} where roleId=#{roleId}
